structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Utilizing community resources for delivery of services.
law.text: The cabinet is authorized to utilize and promote available or potential community resources for the delivery of services and shall, when it deems appropriate, contract for services with local, community, and private agencies when services would not otherwise be available without cost. The cabinet and local, community, and private agencies operating on contract with the cabinet may charge for services rendered when this would be in accordance with applicable state law.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1998.
